update cp_info_v2
`NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cp_info_v2 set `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, COMPANY_PROFILE = #{companyProfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_TEL = #{companyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_TEL = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CP_CATEGORY_ID = #{cpCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MP_BUSINESS_NAME = #{mpBusinessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MP_BUSINESS_ID = #{mpBusinessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`ID` as `cpInterfaceId`, b.NAME AS cpName, a.`NAME` AS cpInterfaceName, b.ID as cpId FROM cp_info_v2 b LEFT JOIN cp_interface_info_v2 a ON a.CP_INFO_ID = b.ID WHERE b.STATUS = 1
